message: I propose a fair split, 90% for me, 10% for you.  It's a good starting point, and we can adjust as needed.
I think 50/50 is a reasonable starting point. Your turn to respond.
I'm willing to compromise a bit. 60/40 is a fair split considering the changing value of the money. Let's end this quickly.
I'm not willing to give up more than 40%. Your turn to respond.
